TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISerializationSurrogateProvider2 implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogateProvider

Docs.summary: Provides the methods needed to substitute one type for another by DataContractSerializer during export and import of XML schema documents (XSD). This interface builds upon .
Docs.remarks: Together with ISerializationCodeDomSurrogateProvider, these interfaces replace the IDataContractSurrogate interface from .NET Framework 4.8.

Docs.param: The data contract type to be annotated.

Docs.returns: An object that represents the annotation to be inserted into the XML schema definition.
